data.title: Floyd Bowman, Jr. Obituary 2017
data.meta_description: Floyd Plemon Bowman, Jr. passed away April 6, 2017 at the age of 89. He was born December 9, 1927 to the late Floyd Plemon Bowman, Sr. and Annie Laura Pope Bowman.    He was a g...
data.text:
Floyd Plemon Bowman, Jr. passed away April 6, 2017 at the age of 89. He was born December 9, 1927 to the late Floyd Plemon Bowman, Sr. and Annie Laura Pope Bowman.

He was a graduate of the Parrish High School class of 1946.

He is survived by his wife, Sara Jones Bowman; son, William Hunt Bowman; daughters, Ann Bowman Hart and Linda Bowman Rester; grandchildren, Christopher Gregory Hart and Matthew Austin Rester; great-grandson, Jackson Hart; step-grandson, Nick Rester; special cousins, Joyce Owens and Bobby Binford; special friends, Russell Greene, V.P. “Bo” Bosarge and Coach Larry Chapman and numerous relatives and friends.

Graveside services will be Sunday, April 9, 2017 at 2:00 p.m. in New Live Oak Cemetery with Dr. Jerry Light officiating and Lawrence Brown-Service Funeral Home directing.

In lieu of flowers, the family requests that you make memorial donations to Visually Impaired People Organization; P.O. Box 1473 Selma, Alabama 36702
